title: Navaratna Karna Phool - Nine Gemstone Stud Earrings
materials: Coral. Hyderabadi Polish for enduring shine.
features: A delicate floral motif featuring the traditional Navaratna arrangement. Each gemstone is meticulously set to represent the nine celestial influences. The gold is crafted with a modern setting style emphasizing each gemstone's radiance. Classic Telugu styling with a touch of contemporary flair.
colors: Gold with a vibrant array of colors from the gemstones: Ruby red
occasions: or as a meaningful gift. Appropriate for smaller festivals like Ugadi and Sankranthi.
description: Crafted with authentic 22K gold and genuine gemstones, these Navaratna earrings offer both beauty and astrological significance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting luster. These earrings are designed for daily wear and celebration and provide good luck and well-being.
